title: Transfer Deadline Special
description:
The FC crew recap all the major news from transfer deadline day, including Chelsea's late moves for Aubameyang and Zakaria, Barcelona's Bellerin signing and Liverpool's surprise Arthur move. Plus, Man United stitch together their 3rd-straight win in the Premier League.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea and Barcelona the big movers on transfer deadline day; Man United win 3rd-straight game; Arthur makes surprise move to Liverpool
